sentences.en: a shallow argument
sentences.cn: 肤浅的论点

sentences.en: a shallow river
sentences.cn: 浅河

sentences.en: a shallow, unsatisfying relationship
sentences.cn: 淡薄而不令人满意的关系

sentences.en: He dived off the springboard and swam down to the shallow end.
sentences.cn: 他从跳板跳下,潜入水中,游到浅水池边.

sentences.en: He got in at the shallow end of the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 他在游泳池的浅水区下水.

sentences.en: He's a shallow, dis-agreeable man.
sentences.cn: 他是个肤浅、难相处的人。

sentences.en: His analysis was always shallow.
sentences.cn: 他的分析总是很肤浅的.

sentences.en: It was fortunate that the water was shallow.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是水很浅。

sentences.en: Lowered sea levels exposed the shallow continental shelf beneath the Bering Sea.
sentences.cn: 海平面下降使白令海底部的浅层大陆架暴露出来。

sentences.en: Place the meat in a shallow dish.
sentences.cn: 把肉放在一个浅盘里。

sentences.en: She began to hear her own taut, shallow breathing.
sentences.cn: 她开始听见自己急促、微弱的呼吸。

sentences.en: The cowboy splashed his way across the shallow stream with his cow.
sentences.cn: 牧童牵着牛淌过浅溪.

sentences.en: The dish is too shallow to serve soup in.
sentences.cn: 盘子太浅,盛不了汤.

sentences.en: The evening news is often criticized for being shallow.
sentences.cn: 晚间新闻常因其内容肤浅而受到批评。

sentences.en: The lake is quite shallow.
sentences.cn: 这湖很浅。

sentences.en: the shallow end of the pool
sentences.cn: 游泳池的浅水区

sentences.en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentences.cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

sentences.en: The ship was grounded in shallow water.
sentences.cn: 船在水浅处搁浅.

sentences.en: Tony seemed very shallow and immature.
sentences.cn: 托尼看起来好像很肤浅,不夠成熟.

sentences.en: With one exce-ption his novels are shallow and lifeless things.
sentences.cn: 他的小说都是些肤浅沉闷的玩意儿，只有一本除外。

trans.tran_cn: 浅的，肤浅的，（呼吸）浅的，弱的
trans.tran_en: measuring only a short distance from the top to the bottom
